InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The name CoolCore says it all. Designed by Juno Starwerk to be as hardworking as you are, this cooler helps ensure that your entire ship operates well within desired temperature parameters.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Surveyor radar from Chimera Communications does away with all the unnecessary extras other manufacturers hide behind to focus on what matters: signature and emission detection that works the way you need it to.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-313 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 1xS3

Behring’s MSD-313 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of one S3 missile.

InstalledItem.Name: Arrester III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 3

Using cross section targeting to hunt for its prey, the Firestorm Arrester proximity missile makes quick work of enemies caught in the crosshairs.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-322 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Tempest II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 2

The Tempest was designed with nothing but annihilation in mind. Utilizing FireStorm Kinetics' targeting technology, this proximity missile locks onto a target's cross section to draw conflicts to a swift conclusion.
